short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtube Controller hidden & Caption move freely

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. The playback progress bar can be kept visible continuously by pressing Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + U.
2. You can hide/show the playback controller UI and the progress bar using Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + i, O, P.
3. Subtitles can be freely moved and locked in position.
4. I don't like these default shortcuts. This configuration is designed to avoid key conflicts. You can also reconfigure the shortcuts in Extension -> Keyboard Shortcuts.

Feel free to use this free plugin, and have a great time playing! 

Super John
